 2017-16512017-12-14,  EC,  ,  , 
ActHistoric Sites and Monuments Act
PrecisRe-appointment of RICHARD M. ALWAY, O.C., O.Ont., of Toronto, Ontario, as a member; and his designation as Chairman of the Historic Sites and Monuments Board of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a period of five years, effective January 11, 2018.
